```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

### Settings

```{r}

sliderInput("nsim", "Number of Simulations", min = 1, max = 13, value = 3)
sliderInput("iterations", "Number of Iterations", min = 100, max = 10000, value = 5000)


```

### Output

```{r}

Data <- reactive({
  Draw_MH(K = input$nsim, N = input$iterations)
})
renderPlot({plot_mh(Data())})

```
